full_summary:
## Tender Announcement #5699: Stage 1 - Kwisitis VC Structure & Window Restoration - Pacific Rim National Park Reserve

### Supply Name (appel d'offres) : Stage 1 - Rénovation de la structure et des fenêtres du Centre d'accueil Kwisitis – Réserve de parc national Pacific Rim

### Solicitation (appel d'offres) Number: 5P468-23-0042/A

#### Notice Type (avis-type): Invitation to Qualify

**Project Scope (reconnaissance de projet)**

Parks Canada requires the structural remediation of a historic wood-framed building at the Pacific Rim National Park Reserve, including structural repairs, window replacement, electrical, and mechanical upgrades. The project is expected to be worth between $500,001 and $1,000,000.

**Submission Requirements (requerements de soumission)**

Interested contractors should submit a bid in two stages. The first stage will evaluate qualifications, and the second stage will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid based on specifications and drawings. 

**Key Dates (dates clés)**

*   Bidder's conference: May 25, 2023, 1:00 p.m. MDT
*   Tender closing date: June 1, 2023, 4:00 p.m. MDT
*   Expected contract start date: June 29, 2023
*   Expected contract end date: November 16, 2023

**Sources of Supply (sources de fournitures)**

The tender documents are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service: [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca). Interested contractors should register with the service to access tender opportunities.

**Contact Information (Coordonnées de contact)**

*   Jen Maheu, contract officer: [jennifer.maheu@pc.gc.ca](mailto:jennifer.maheu@pc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (587) 432-8458

### Attachments (pièces jointes)

Please refer to the tender documents for detailed instructions on submitting a bid, including file size requirements and acceptable email formats. Prior to submitting a bid, contact Jen Maheu to confirm participation and receive dial-in coordinates.

Upon receipt of a bid, Parks Canada will evaluate the qualification of the contenders and will approach only the qualified contractors with the ITT for Stage 2, the financial
